---
title: Places Administrator
description: Places Administrator
ms.service: entra-id
ms.subservice: role-based-access-control
ms.topic: include
ms.date: 09/01/2025
ms.custom: include file
---

Assign the Places Administrator role to users who need to do the following tasks:

- Manage all aspects of the Microsoft Places service
- Configure and manage buildings, floors, rooms, and desks
- Oversee and manage associated booking policies

[Learn more](/microsoft-365/places/configure-admin-roles)

> [!div class="mx-tableFixed"]
> | Actions | Description |
> | --- | --- |
> | microsoft.places/allEntities/allProperties/allTasks | Manage all aspects of the Microsoft Places service |
